text: Châteauroux is a commune in the Indre department in the center of France. Aérocentre is in Châteauroux. ==Sport== * Châteauroux is the end of the 7th stage of the 2011 Tour de France. ==Sister cities== Châteauroux is twinned with: * Gütersloh, Germany since 1977 * Bittou Department, Burkina Faso since November 1985 * Olsztyn, Poland since 23 February 1991
title: Châteauroux
